rows.label: tev017601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Thomas about the indigens in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Thomas about the indigens in Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0101
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0121
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0091
rows.name: Ask Thomas about Skell-based combat.

rows.label: tev017601_SEL0141
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_SEL4021
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.

rows.label: tev017601_SEL5021
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.

rows.label: tev017601_SEL6021
rows.name: Ask Thomas about recent developments.

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0015
rows.name:
Why not get used to battling indigens by fighting some
ovis? This place is lousy with 'em, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0016
rows.name:
Unlike grexes and other, more ferocious indigens,
ovis won't even attack unless you hit them first.
That makes them useful as training dummies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0017
rows.name:
Another piece of advice: don't mistakenly pick a fight
with any of the dangerous creatures near Sayram Lake
to the north.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0018
rows.name:
Numerous skilled Interceptors have fallen to the
indigens in that area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0019
rows.name:
As noble a goal as protecting the city is, it's not worth
risking your life like that. If you ever catch the eye of
one of those indigens, just turn and run away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0025
rows.name: Apparently, Nelson's team has gone missing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0026
rows.name:
They had planned to install a number of data probes
and then come straight back to the city.
What could have happened to them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0027
rows.name:
I don't know what sort of foe they ran into, but let this
be a lesson; you have to be careful when you're
exploring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0032
rows.name:
I heard they found the fort of the Prone xenoforms
that murdered Nelson's team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0033
rows.name:
The entire Interceptors division has been put on high
alert so we'll be ready to repel them when they attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0034
rows.name:
Anyway, you can leave that sort of thing to us.
You go ahead and focus on your exploration mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0035
rows.name:
I vow on my pride as an Interceptor that not a single
Prone will set foot in this city![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0040
rows.name:
There's the rampaging duoguill at the pond near
Roof Rock, the xiphias that was discovered at
Northpointe Cove...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0041
rows.name: Luciel, the Eternal, the millesaur at West Janpath Plain...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0042
rows.name:
There do seem to be quite a few tyrants that appear
in this area![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0043
rows.name: They've already claimed the lives of many Harriers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0044
rows.name:
So don't even try to engage them unless you're
extremely confident in your skills![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0050
rows.name:
A ship belonging to a new type of xenoform has been
discovered on the continent of Oblivia to the northeast
of New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0051
rows.name:
The indigens here are nothing compared to the
ferocious beasts that inhabit that region.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0052
rows.name:
And we can't dismiss the possibility that those xenos
will be as hostile as the Prone we've already met.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0053
rows.name:
If you're heading out to see for yourself, make sure
you're well equipped for a dangerous journey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0058
rows.name:
When the Ma-non ship flew in from the east,
I was sure we were under enemy attack![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0059
rows.name:
It was certainly a relief to hear that they'd come to sign
a friendship treaty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0060
rows.name:
If we can ally with an alien race that has access to that
level of technology, it could make this war a whole lot
easier from here on out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0061
rows.name:
Things haven't been easy for us, but I feel like this at
least provides a glimmer of hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0065
rows.name:
I can't believe we slugged it out with the Ganglion.
Talk about a fierce battle![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0066
rows.name:
While you were bravely defending the city,
we were running around its perimeter,
trying to head off the incoming enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0067
rows.name:
But no matter how many we killed, more and more
reinforcements kept pouring in from the north.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0068
rows.name:
If you travel far northeast of here, you'll eventually
reach the continent of Sylvalum. I wonder if the
enemy's headquarters are in that region?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0069
rows.name:
If we could get a foothold in that region, it would be
useful in preparing for their next attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0075
rows.name:
*yawn* Man, I'm bored... Boooooored bored bored...
BoooOOooOooooOOOooOOooored...
Plus, this weather is making me sleepy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0076
rows.name:
Hmm? I see the way you're looking at me.
Do you think I'm some sort of layabout?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0077
rows.name:
Let me tell you something, pal! I don't just stand here
all day like a stick in the mud![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0078
rows.name:
Sometimes I'm out there battling fierce indigens to keep
this east gate safe![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0079
rows.name:
So what if I space out at my post now and then?
You don't have any sort of problem with that, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0080
rows.name:
When I see someone using a Skell to shoot down little
indigens like the ovis, I can't help but shake my head.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0081
rows.name:
After all, you barely get any experience for defeating
foes smaller than your Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0082
rows.name:
There's lots of experience you can't earn with Skells
that you can earn in ground combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG0083
rows.name:
You should assess each of your foes and decide
whether they should be fought with a Skell or on foot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG1001
rows.name:
I tried that ball of honeysmoke you recommended
to me, and wow![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG1002
rows.name:
Instead of us having to chase down indigens,
they all came running to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG1003
rows.name:
And then, since we couldn't see anything through the
smoke, my team was decimated and everyone ended
up in the maintenance center! ...I told them to bill you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG2001
rows.name:
That high-temperature-pot invention you recommended
really is incredible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG2002
rows.name:
I heard its temperature never cools so I thought,
"You know, this just might work."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG2003
rows.name:
Then I brought it to a xenoform craftsman,
had it installed in my Skell, and BOOM!
Thing worked like a charm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG2004
rows.name:
Now it's good-bye fuel problems,
hello self-powered thermoelectric Skell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG2005
rows.name:
Of course, there's now a big saucepan sticking out of
its back, which doesn't look cool at all. ...But still![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG2006
rows.name:
What's important is that my success rate is way up,
and I'm doing twice as many jobs as I did before.
Thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG3001
rows.name:
That electric hammock you recommended was
incredible![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG3002
rows.name:
I've had lower back problems for a while now,
but when I woke up after a night in that hammock,
the pain was completely gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG3003
rows.name: I'm never gonna give that thing up. Thanks![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG4001
rows.name:
You wouldn't believe how many monsters surrounded
us when we tossed out that ball of honeysmoke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG4002
rows.name: What a disaster. It's a miracle I survived![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG4003
rows.name:
You know what? I'm gonna have L split the bill for
my team's repairs. You tell him to take responsibility
for this! He can't run away from me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG5001
rows.name:
I never imagined a single saucepan could generate
enough heat to power an entire Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG5002
rows.name:
L's a true genius. He really has some fantastic products
including that high-temperature-pot invention of his.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG5003
rows.name:
Tell him I'm gonna keep this city safe with my super
saucepan Skell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG6001
rows.name:
Thanks to that electric hammock you recommended,
my back has never felt better.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG6002
rows.name:
L really is a genius. I can't believe he's managed to
make ergonomic goods that are even effective on
mimeosomes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev017601_MSG6003
rows.name:
That store of his is gonna be the first place I shop
from now on.[ST:wait ]
